Really We have recently started uh bin program here in Plano where uh - used to be we we put all of our trash in green bags and the trash men came out twice week and picked up And now they have uh these large green containers and you have to put your trash that you dont recycle in there And then they havent started curbside recycling yet but theyre but theyre planning on doing it very soon Apparently the trucks that they had um lined up they needed the parts for Saudi Arabia
